name: Five Night`s at Sharagh 2
description:
Five Night`s at Sharagh is a fan game that I made in a week in construct 2.

Welcome. this is the "long awaited" Five Night`s at Sharagh 2. Continuation of the series of games "FNAS".

(If you haven't played Part 1, here's the link)  

In this part, I tried to refine the mechanics of the previous game, and also made new ones. Lore also appeared in the game. 

You have to play as David Garison, who works in a research and development company. Or worked... One way or another, you have to hold out for 5 nights together with the "other" participants in the experiment. Now you have infinite electricity, but no doors... How can you protect yourself? HM... The local inhabitants are not used to bright estimates, so use a camera for protection. But don't forget about its cooldown and not infinite charge.


One of the new mechanics is the phone mechanic. You will receive calls over and over again, but be careful and answer only the correct numbers.

\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\

Who knows, maybe I will do part 3. It all depends on you. )
